titles: The decease of Lazarus Christ's friend A funerall sermon on Iohn. chap. 11. vers. 11. preached at the buriall of Mr. John Parker merchant and citizen of London. By Tho. Gataker B. of D. and rector of Rotherhith.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Edward Brewster, and Fulke Clyfton, and are to be sold at the Bible on Fleet-bridge, and on New-Fishstreet-Hill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Parker, John, d. 1639 or 40 --  Early works to 1800.
